Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: We need to produce answer identify violations of normative rules across cases explain reasons then identify desiderata violations give interpretations justifications We have 3 cases Identify normative violations per case

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Case 1 sequence is correct Application Received Credit Check Risk Assessment Loan Decision Inform Applicant Finalize Documentation Close Case All ordering rules satisfied No forbidden actions So no violation

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Case 2 Violations Step 2 Risk Assessment before Credit Check violates sequence Credit Check must be before Risk Assessment So normative violation timeline Application Received Risk Assessment then Credit Check Loan Decision Rejected

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: After loan decision Rejected they performed Finalize Documentation before closing case That violates rule no finalize after rejection So case 2 violates normative

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Case 3 Normative sequence is correct Application Received Credit Check Risk Assessment Loan Decision Inform Applicant Finalize Documentation Close Case All steps present no reversal normative compliance is okay Thus normative violations only Case 2

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Now desiderata violations Desiderata credit check within 24h after application received applicant informed within 48h after loan decision encouraged Followup Call to applicant sometime before closing the case

Name: Deductive Reasoning - IND
Text: Case 3 credit check delayed beyond 24h inform applicant delayed beyond 48h no Followup Call Case 2 no explicit Inform Applicant recorded no Followup Call All three lack Followup Call desiderata violations Cases 2 and 3 possibly

Name: Abductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Interpretations for case 2 maybe the risk assessment was performed on preliminary data credit check later due to system delay maybe they reorganized tasks maybe provisional risk assessment Case 3 delays may be due to workload backlog scheduling loan officer needed more time

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - IND
Text: Now produce answer part 1 normative violations identified and reasons part 2 desiderata violations identified and explanations part 3 provide interpretations justifications Now craft final answer organized Will produce bullet points
